name: Hello Pollution!
description:
Waste disposal simulator. Operate a questionable waste disposal business.

You have just started your new waste disposal company, but seems that something unusual is happening around you. Bury junk and waste without causing serious environmental disasters. Out of sight, out of mind... or is it?


Features:

● Physics-based puzzles.
● A narrative story.
● Dynamic gameplay with unpredictable situations.
● Game controller support.
● A game inspired by real-life waste management scandals.
